QueryText: CONTROL OF RHIZOME ROT OR SOFT ROT IN GINGER.
KCCAns: RECOMMENDED FOR Application of Trichoderma harzianum @5gram along with neem cake @ 1kg/bed helps in preventing the disease.

QueryText: ASKING ABOUT GINGER FIELD PREPARATION AND SEED TREATMENT
KCCAns:
RECOMMENDED FOR Seed treatment

Seed treatment with 3 % Dasagavya for 30 minutes followed by seed treatment with 5% Pseudomonas fluorescens. Seed treatment with biofertilizers like Azospirillum and Phosphobacteria @ 500 g/ ha using rice gruel should also be done.  

Manuring

Green manuring with lupin 15 days before planting should be done to increase the available N status of the soil
Application of well decomposed farmyard manure @ 30 t / ha at the time of land preparation 
Application of biodynamic compost @ 5 t / ha at the time of land preparation 
At the time of land preparation, application of vermicompost @ 2.5 t / ha should be done 
At the time of land preparation, application of biofertilizers like Azospirillum and Phosphobacteria each @ 5 Kg / ha should to be done
During land preparation, sprinkling of horn manure to the soil at the rate of 75 g / ha by dissolving it in 40 litres of water should be done to maintain the soil pH and also to increase the Ca levels of soil
RECOMMENDED FOR Spray neem oil 3ML/LITER OF WATER

QueryText: Asking about Pod borer in pea?
KCCAns: Recommended for spray of Neem oil @ 3ml/lit of water and seed treatment with Trichoderma viridea @ 4gm/kg of seeds...

QueryText: Asking about Pod borer in pea?
KCCAns: Recommended to Apply neem oil @ 3ml/lit of water and treat the seeds with Trichoderma viridea with 4gm/kg of seeds

QueryText: ASKING ABOUT PLANTING TIME OF PAPAYA.
KCCAns: RECOMMENDED FOR 500GRAM OF SEED IS REQUIRED FOR PLANTING ONE HACTER JUNE-SEPTEMBER IS BEST SEASON FOR PLANTING.AVOID THE RAINY SEASON.

QueryText: ASKING ABOUT CONTROL OF DAMPING OFF/RHIZOME ROT/CLAMP ROT IN CARDAMOM
KCCAns: RECOMMENDED FOR BORDEAUX MIXTURE@1% FOR SOIL DRENCHING  BEFORE 15 DAYS OF SOWING,DISTRUCTION OF DISEASED CLUMPS,PROVIDING PROPER DRAINAGE

QueryText: Asking about  control of ants in cabbage
KCCAns: Recommended for spray  of metagreen Bio-controlling Agent 2ml / liter of water

QueryText: CONTROL OF POWDERY MILDEW IN PEA
KCCAns: RECOMMENDED FOR SPARY AZADIRACHTIN @3ML PER LITRE OF WATER.
